mapper.select: SELECT m.num AS userNum, m.id AS userId, m.pwd AS userPwd, m.email AS userEmail, m.NAME AS userName, m.age AS userAge, m.gender AS userGender, b.num AS badgeNum, b.name AS badgeName FROM member m LEFT JOIN assigned_badge mb ON m.num = mb.member_num LEFT JOIN badge b ON mb.badge_num = b.num WHERE m.num = #{userNum}
